text: Kadambur R. Janarthanan (22 October 1929 - 26 December 2020) was an Indian politician and trade unionist. He was born in Tamil Nadu, India. He was first elected to the Lok Sabha in 1984. He left the parliament in 1996 only to serve again from 1998 to 1999. Janarthanan died on 26 December 2020 at the age of 91."கருணாநிதியிசம்".. தேர்தலில் தோல்வியையே தழுவாத.. மாஜி மத்திய அமைச்சர் கடம்பூர் ஜனார்த்தனம் காலமானார் ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Tamil Nadu politicians Category:Indian businesspeople Category:Trade unionists Category:Members of the Lok Sabha Category:All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam politicians
title: Kadambur R. Janarthanan
